content: Are there some examples available that use meta tags? Especially the security tags?

Well, it has a security label in the DocumentReference.securityLabel. What I am looking for is security tag use in the Resource header. Such as marking a sensitive Condition or Observation or Medication as "R" while the others are "N" (or assumed to be N through lack of a tag).
Grahame, do you still have your server instrumented with Mike Davis / Duane's automatic security tagging service?
that hasn't been maintained post DSTU1, so far as I know
